title: Coronavirus: Nova Scotia now has 41 cases, including at least one child under 10 - Global News
description: Coronavirus: Nova Scotia now has 41 cases, including at least one child under 10 Global News N.S. reports 13 new COVID-19 cases, including one involving a child CTV News COVID-19 cases mount in N.S., but officials hope measures show 'indication of success' CB…
content: Thirteen new cases of COVID have been identified in Nova Scotia including a child under the age of the provincial government says According to a news release on Monday all the cases are travel related or connected to earlier reported cases Severa chars
